movies.title: Frauen sind für die Liebe da

biography.bio: Maria Sebaldt was born on April 26, 1930 in Berlin-Steglitz, Germany. She is an actress, known for Die Wicherts von nebenan (1986), Gewagtes Spiel (1964) and Fais ta valise Sherlock Holmes (1960). She was previously married to Robert Freitag.
biography.name: Maria Sebaldt

biography.bio: Carla Hagen was born on September 11, 1931 in Hamburg, Germany as Carla-Maria Hagen. She is an actress, known for Le plongeon de Véra (1999), Die Frau des Fotografen oder Die große Liebe (1967) and Hôtel du commerce (1969).
biography.name: Carla Hagen

biography.bio: Elfie Pertramer was born on November 18, 1924 in Munich, Germany as Elfriede Bernreuther. She was an actress and director, known for Max, der Taschendieb (1962), Ein Mann geht durch die Wand (1959) and Die Mustergattin (1958). She died on November 16, 2011 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Elfie Pertramer

biography.bio: Trude Hesterberg was born on May 2, 1892 in Berlin, Germany as Gertrud Johanna Dorothea Helene Hesterberg. She was an actress, known for L'histoire du petit Muck (1953), Corinna Schmidt (1951) and Lady Frederick (1963). She was married to Fritz Schönherr. She died on August 31, 1967 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Trude Hesterberg

biography.bio: Erika von Thellmann was born on August 31, 1902 in Leutschau, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for The Good Soldier Schweik (1960), Willi Manages the Whole Thing (1972) and Leben wie die Fürsten (1966). She was married to Tino Pattiera. She died on October 27, 1988 in Calw, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.
biography.name: Erika von Thellmann

biography.bio: Lieselotte Bruhns is an actress, known for Kündigungen (1969), Frauen sind für die Liebe da (1957) and Hochzeitsnacht (1967).
biography.name: Lieselotte Bruhns

biography.bio: Christiane Maybach was born on March 14, 1932 in Berlin, Germany as Uschi Müller. She was an actress, known for Unter uns (1994), Fox and His Friends (1975) and $ (1971). She died on April 12, 2006 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Christiane Maybach

biography.bio: Petra Unkel was born on March 3, 1925 in Hungary. She is an actress, known for Right to Happiness (1932), Pappi (1934) and Sensation in San Remo (1951).
biography.name: Petra Unkel

biography.bio: Barbara Gallauner was born on September 26, 1912 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for The Nasty Girl (1990), Hänsel und Gretel (1954) and Crook and the Cross (1960). She died in 2011 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Barbara Gallauner

biography.bio: Anita Bucher is an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Quadrille (1961) and Die verschenkten Jahre (1966).
biography.name: Anita Bucher

biography.bio: Ingeborg Christiansen was born on November 12, 1930 in Hamburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Das Erbe der Guldenburgs (1987), Der fröhliche Weinberg (1961) and Ich bin nicht der Eiffelturm (1969).
biography.name: Ingeborg Christiansen

biography.bio: Edeltraud Dümler was born in 1939 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress, known for Frauen sind für die Liebe da (1957).
biography.name: Edeltraud Dümler

biography.bio: Angela Hartmann is an actress, known for Der Schleier fiel (1960), Frauen sind für die Liebe da (1957) and Orientalische Nächte (1960).
biography.name: Angela Hartmann

biography.bio: Susi Jera is an actress, known for Der entscheidende Augenblick (1957), Meine Herren Söhne (1945) and Egon, der Frauenheld (1957).
biography.name: Susi Jera

biography.bio: Herma Reimers is an actress, known for Frauen sind für die Liebe da (1957) and Heiße Ernte (1956).
biography.name: Herma Reimers
